channel.title: CVE Feed for Duet Display -- all

item.title: CVE-2023-6235|2023-11-21T12:24:55.918Z -- duet%20display -- duet%20display%20for%20windows%2010%2B
item.description: An uncontrolled search path element vulnerability has been found in the Duet Display product, affecting version 2.5.9.1. An attacker could place an arbitrary libusk.dll file in the C:\Users\user\AppData\Local\Microsoft\WindowsApps\ directory, which could lead to the execution and persistence of arbitrary code.
